SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 22 (Xinhua) -- Amazon announced on Monday that the company will kick off its Cyber Monday deals on Saturday, offering customers more deals and discounts for the gifting season.

The Cyber Monday deals will run through Monday, Nov. 29. Throughout the weekend and on Cyber Monday, customers will find savings on gifts and products from some top brands as well as deals from small businesses, Amazon said.

Prime members can get 30 minutes of early access to the Lightning Deals on Amazon throughout the holiday season before they are gone, according to the company.

To meet the needs of customers during the holiday season, Amazon recently announced plans to add 125,000 full- and part-time roles, plus an additional 150,000 seasonal jobs. Enditem
